entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
